NK005(ca)008:1: // dpal yang dag he ru ka'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs ni /
NK005(ca)008:2: ston pa kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' che //
NK005(ca)008:3: dga' rab rdo rje 'jam dpal bshes gnyen dang //
NK005(ca)008:4: ro langs bde ba sangs rgyas gsang ba la //
NK005(ca)008:5: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
NK005(ca)008:6: bal po h+aum mdzad pad+ma sam b+ha wa //
NK005(ca)008:7: nam mkha'i snying po ye shes gzhon nu dang //
NK005(ca)008:8: dpal gyi ye shes gnubs chen sangs rgyas la //
NK005(ca)008:9: gsol ba ye dbang kalpo dbang gi gtsug tor dang //
NK005(ca)008:10: so ston rgyal po chos seng r+aa dza 'bar //
NK005(ca)008:11: chos ye bstan pa rgyal tsha mgon po la //
NK005(ca)008:12: gsol ba pad+ma rgyal mtshan bde gshegs pad 'byung dang //
NK005(ca)008:13: rat+na sh+r+ai chos mchog chos ldan zhabs //
NK005(ca)008:14: gsang bdag se ston dpal 'bum mgon bzang la //
NK005(ca)008:15: gsol ba rin chen rgyal mtshan mgon po zla ba dang //
NK005(ca)008:16: ngag dbang rdo rje dpal ldan bkra shis zhabs //
NK005(ca)008:17: legs grub tshe ring rdo rje chos dbyings la //
NK005(ca)008:18: gsol ba gter bdag gling pa 'gyur med rgya mtsho'i sde //
NK005(ca)008:19: rin chen rnam rgyal o rgyan bstan 'dzin rje //
NK005(ca)008:20: phrin las rnam rgyal phrin las chos kyi sgron //
NK005(ca)008:21: gsol ba sangs rgyas kun dga' bstan 'dzin nor bu'i sde //
NK005(ca)008:22: rigs bdag 'gyur med phan bde'i 'od zer zhabs //
NK005(ca)008:23: brgyud srol kun 'dus rtsa ba'i bla ma la //
NK005(ca)008:24: gsol ba rab 'byams dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbang phyug che //
NK005(ca)008:25: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'khor lo'i lha //
NK005(ca)008:26: d+aa ki chos skyong rgya mtsho'i tshogs bcas la //
NK005(ca)008:27: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
NK005(ca)008:28: brgyud gsum bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
NK005(ca)008:29: 'bral med sgo gsum nyid du rab bsgrubs pas //
NK005(ca)008:30: dbang bzhis bstan don bskyed rdzogs yan lag bzhis //
NK005(ca)008:31: rig 'dzin bzhi dang sku bzhi mngon byed shog /
NK005(ca)008:32: ces rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas kyis mdzad pa'i
NK005(ca)008:33: brgyud 'debs la brgyud pa'i khyad par gyis rgyal sras
NK005(ca)008:34: rin chen rnam rgyal nas bdag gi rigs bdag 'gyur
NK005(ca)008:35: med phan bde'i 'od zer bar kha bsgyur ba po
